item.title: 桑德韦尔寻求美国和加拿大法院的生命线
item.description:
在向专制政权销售产品引发争议之后，这家技术公司正努力求生存。【原文：

The technology company is struggling to survive after controversy over sales to authoritarian regimes.

】

item.title: 意大利出售新帕斯基银行股份，国家希望退出贷款人行列
item.description: 意大利正在出售 Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 公司 7% 的股份，这是早在 2017 年就开始的详尽重组行动的最新一步。【原文：Italy is selling a 7% stake in Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA, the latest step in an exhaustive restructuring drive that dates back to 2017.】

item.title: 摩根大通凯利称特朗普关税将打击经济增长，加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）的大卫-凯利（David Kelly）表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）激进的关税计划可能会放缓全球经济，并给美国通胀带来上行压力。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management’s David Kelly said President-elect Donald Trump’s aggressive tariff plans would likely slow the global economy and put upward pressure on US inflation, flagging risks that have largely been overshadowed during the stock market’s post-election rally.】

item.title: 意大利电信盈利符合预期，债务目标指日可待
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）公布的季度收益达到了分析师的预期，并重申了其减债目标，原因是巴西的增长以及云计算和网络安全服务需求的上升。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA posted quarterly earnings that met analyst estimates and reaffirmed its debt reduction targets on growth in Brazil and rising demand for cloud and cybersecurity services.】

item.title: 星巴克下调评级至 "卖出"，Redburn 警告经济复苏之路崎岖不平
item.description: 当星巴克公司任命布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）领导反弹工作时，华尔街一片欢呼。三个月后，当 Redburn Atlantic 告诉投资者抛售这家咖啡连锁店的股票时，欢呼声渐渐消失了。【原文：Wall Street applauded when Starbucks Corp. named Brian Niccol to head a rebound effort. Three months later, the cheers are fading as Redburn Atlantic tells investors to dump the coffee chain’s shares.】

item.title: AMD 裁员约 4%，集中资源推进人工智能发展
item.description: 先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. is shedding about a thousand jobs as part of an effort to refocus on newer markets like artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 马克龙呼吁欧盟推迟巴塞尔银行规则，如果美国也这样做的话
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）表示，欧盟应与美国 "同步 "实施金融监管，并再次呼吁不要实施比其他国家更严格的规则。【原文：Emmanuel Macron said the European Union should “synchronize” its financial regulation with the US, repeating his call not to apply stricter rules than others.】

item.title: 墨西哥不会利用市场解决石油公司债务问题，而是简化税收制度
item.description: 墨西哥当局周三表示，墨西哥石油公司正在寻求解决近 1,000 亿美元的债务问题，而无需在短期内求助于资本市场。【原文：Mexico is looking to address Petroleos Mexicanos’ nearly $100 billion debt load without having the company turn to capital markets in the short term, authorities said Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国企业瞄准法兰克福欧洲上市复兴之路
item.description: 中国公司正在探索将德国作为集资地点，此举可能会重振其全球存托凭证的欧洲市场。【原文：Chinese companies are exploring Germany as a fundraising venue, in a move that could reinvigorate the European market for their global depositary receipts.】

item.title: 马克龙警告欧洲正驶向与美国和中国的关税战
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙警告说，欧洲有可能因唐纳德-特朗普的经济政策而分裂，并同时陷入与华盛顿和北京的贸易战。【原文：Emmanuel Macron warned that Europe risks getting divided by Donald Trump’s economic policy and being thrown into a simultaneous trade war with Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 诺沃格拉茨称特朗普执政期间建立比特币战略储备的几率很低
item.description: 加密货币投资公司银河数字（Galaxy Digital）的亿万富翁负责人迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）表示，美国按照当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的提议建立比特币战略储备的可能性很低。【原文：Michael Novogratz, the billionaire head of crypto investment firm Galaxy Digital, said there is a low likelihood that the US will set up a Bitcoin strategic reserve as proposed by President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 家庭债务再创新高，低收入美国人不堪重负
item.description: 美国家庭债务在上一季度攀升至新高，收入的增加使许多消费者有能力承受债务负担，但低收入群体则显示出财务紧张的迹象。【原文：US household debt climbed to a fresh high last quarter, with rising incomes leaving many consumers able to manage the burden, but lower-income groups showing signs of financial strain.】

item.title: 玫瑰碗 "将在特朗普上台前利用免税债券进行债务再融资
item.description: 洛杉矶东北部拥有 102 年历史的玫瑰碗体育场的管理者本周前往华尔街，将应纳税的 "建设美国债券 "退还为免税债务。【原文：Managers of the Rose Bowl, the 102-year-old stadium northeast of Los Angeles, head to Wall Street this week to refund taxable Build America Bonds into tax-exempt debt.】

item.title: 自由媒体的马菲卸任，为二十年的交易画上句号
item.description: 自由媒体公司（Liberty Media Corp.自由媒体公司首席执行官格雷格-马菲（Greg Maffei）将于今年年底卸任，此前他在董事长约翰-马龙（John Malone）的媒体、体育和电信帝国中进行了近二十年的交易。【原文：Liberty Media Corp. Chief Executive Officer Greg Maffei will step down at the end of this year after nearly two decades of dealmaking at Chairman John Malone’s media, sports and telecom empire.】

item.title: 救援谈判陷入僵局，Northvolt 召开股东大会
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，电池制造商 Northvolt AB 于周三召开股东大会，因为筹集 3 亿美元紧急资金的谈判已进入关键时刻。【原文：Battery maker Northvolt AB called a shareholder meeting for Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter, as talks to raise a targeted $300 million in emergency funding reached a critical juncture.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼集团将在美国能源和基础设施领域投资 100 亿美元
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）计划在美国投资 100 亿美元用于能源和基础设施项目，从而加深两国之间的战略商业联系。【原文：India’s Adani Group plans to invest $10 billion in energy and infrastructure projects in the US, deepening strategic business ties between the two countries.】

item.title: 德雅丹称加拿大公共市场存在养老金问题
item.description: 德雅丹集团（Desjardins Group）资本市场主管表示，加拿大养老金对本国公共市场的投资不足，导致本国公司资金匮乏，并面临外国收购的风险。【原文：Canadian pensions are underinvested in the country’s public markets, starving domestic companies of capital and exposing them to foreign takeovers, says the head of capital markets at Desjardins Group.】

item.title: 特斯拉自发布以来第六次召回赛博特卡车
item.description: 自一年前推出 Cybertruck 电动皮卡以来，特斯拉公司已第六次召回该车，这次召回的原因是一个可能导致驾驶员失去推进力而不得不靠边停车的问题。【原文：Tesla Inc. recalled the Cybertruck a sixth time since the electric pickup launched a year ago, this time over an issue that could lead drivers to lose propulsion and have to pull over to the side of the road.】

item.title: 亚马逊推出名为 "Haul "的低价店面，瞄准特姆乌
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）推出了一个在线店面，旨在与低价购物应用程序 Temu 展开竞争，Temu 以低廉的价格换取了较长的运输时间，受到了购物者的青睐。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has launched an online storefront designed to compete with Temu, the low-cost shopping app that gained traction with shoppers who trade longer shipping times for rock-bottom prices.】

item.title: 意大利咖啡机制造商接近达成债务协议
item.description: 意大利咖啡机制造商 Caffitaly System SpA 公司即将达成债务重组协议，其中包括股东提供新资金和削减银行债务。【原文：Italian coffee machine maker Caffitaly System SpA is nearing a debt restructuring agreement, involving new money from shareholders and a haircut on its bank debt.】

item.title: 美联储主席洛根呼吁在不确定因素下保持谨慎的降息步伐
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，虽然可能需要更多的降息措施，但考虑到目前货币政策的限制性程度尚不确定，政策制定者应采取缓慢的步伐。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said while more interest-rate cuts are likely needed, policymakers should move at a slow pace given uncertainties about how restrictive monetary policy currently is.】

item.title: 亿万富翁威斯的 Brait 公司希望维珍 Active 于 2026 年上市
item.description: Brait SE 计划在 2026 年下半年将其 Virgin Active 健身连锁店上市，这家由亿万富翁克里斯托-韦斯（Christo Wiese）支持的南非投资控股公司将继续缩减其投资组合。【原文：Brait SE plans to list its Virgin Active fitness chain in the second half of 2026, as the South African investment holding company backed by billionaire Christo Wiese continues to wind down its portfolio.】

item.title: 南非提议修改碳税以增加抵消额度
item.description: 南非国库已提议修改税收制度，以鼓励公司利用碳抵消，并奖励那些实施减排措施的公司。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury has proposed changes to the tax regime to encourage companies to utilize carbon offsets and reward those that implement emissions-mitigation measures.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的 Oklo 签订核电协议，为数据中心供电
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的 Oklo 公司同意向两家数据中心公司提供多达 750 兆瓦的电力，这些电力来自该公司计划建造的核反应堆。【原文：Sam Altman-backed Oklo Inc. agreed to deliver as much as 750 megawatts of electricity from nuclear reactors it plans to build to two data center companies, as technology companies seek to line up energy supplies for the booming industry.】

item.title: Meta 赢得美国联邦贸易委员会对 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 反垄断诉讼的限制令
item.description: 在联邦法官驳回美国联邦贸易委员会的部分指控后，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will face a scaled-back antitrust trial over its alleged dominance of social networking after a federal judge threw out some allegations by the US Federal Trade Commission.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称通胀数据方向正确
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，最新消费者物价报告的最高数据证实，通胀率正朝着央行设定的 2% 的目标下降。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said the top figures from the latest consumer price report confirm inflation is headed down toward the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 以下是美国 10 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周三公布的 10 月份美国消费者价格指数报告的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the October US consumer price index report released Wednesday:】

item.title: OpenAI 称美国盟友应在人工智能领域合作与中国竞争
item.description: OpenAI 呼吁美国及其盟国共同努力，支持开发人工智能系统和与中国竞争所需的基础设施。【原文：OpenAI is calling for the US and its allies to work together to support the infrastructure needed to develop artificial intelligence systems and compete with China.】

item.title: 英国官员警告政府特朗普贸易协议面临的障碍
item.description: 英国官员警告工党政府的部长们，唐纳德-特朗普执政期间与美国的贸易谈判因其提出的关税提议、不愿参与气候相关问题以及在进入公共采购市场方面的分歧而受阻。【原文：UK officials have warned ministers in the Labour government that previous trade talks with the US under Donald Trump were held up by his offer on tariffs, unwillingness to engage on climate-related issues and disagreements over access to public procurement markets.】

item.title: 法国电网称出口限制将很快结束，从三月起恢复
item.description: 制约法国电力出口的电网限制将于本周末结束，但随着法国电网运营商开始新的维护工作，电网限制可能会在明年 3 月或 4 月恢复。【原文：Grid limitations that constrained France’s electricity exports are due to finish by the end of the week, but may resume from next March or April as the country’s network operator starts new maintenance.】
